about_the_game:
Business management combined with adventure- exploration in a beautiful open world

Play as Aslo and try to save grandpa’s beach from tax debt.

Start a business by selling coconuts, try to grow it into beach resorts on multiple islands.

Explore the ocean as a tourist guide OR to hunt for royal crown stolen centuries ago by pirates.

Features:

  • Business Meets Adventure: Experience the perfect blend of business simulation and exploration gameplay.

  • Explore Stunning Locations: Dive into the ocean’s depths, roam beautiful islands, and discover hidden treasures.

  • Grow with the Community: Engage with a vibrant community of guests and locals, building relationships that help your resort flourish.

  • Water Sports Galore: Enjoy a variety of exciting water sports activities, offering new ways to expand your resort and attract tourists.

Whether you're strategizing to grow your beachside ventures or setting sail on daring adventures, ASLO promises an engaging mix of challenge and discovery. Save the beach, solve the mystery, and carve out your legacy!

name: ASLO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Step into the shoes of Aslo, an adventurer on a mission to save his family's beach from debt. Start by selling coconuts and build a thriving beach resort chain. Explore oceans and islands, uncover the mystery of a stolen royal crown, and enjoy a captivating mix of business strategy and adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
